abstract: In this paper, we study some structural properties of [Formula: see text]-additive cyclic codes in [Formula: see text] as [Formula: see text]-submodules of [Formula: see text], where [Formula: see text]. The generators for these codes are obtained and a minimal spanning set is determined for even and odd [Formula: see text] separately with arbitrary [Formula: see text]. We also determine the generators of duals of the [Formula: see text]-additive cyclic codes for odd [Formula: see text]. A necessary condition for a 1-generator [Formula: see text]-cyclic code to be a [Formula: see text]-free module is obtained.
